job.title: Supervising Registered Nurse II (CVSP)
job.description: pstrongSupervising Registered Nurse IIstrongppstrong124332  155640strong annual salaryppbrppDo you want a stable job that comes with all of the benefits of State employment California Correctional Health Care Services CCHCS is seeking experienced and skilled CAlicensed Nurse Managers who are ready to be part of a multidisciplinary team dedicated to providing quality primary medical carenbspppbrppIn this key role you willpulliPlan and evaluate the objectives and effectiveness of statewide programsinitiatives including the Whole Person Care Program Substance Use Disorder Treatment and Hepatitis C and HIV TreatmentliliPlan assign supervise and evaluate the work of program nursing staff social services and administrative support staffliliComplete audits ensuring proper documentation of patient care activities and participate in ongoing quality managementimprovement effortsliulpbrppTo thrive in this role you must possess three years of registered nursing experience within the last five years one year of which must have been in a supervisory capacity and two years of which must have been in a general acute care hospital Possession of a Bachelor of Science Degree in Nursing or a Masters Degree in Nursing may be substituted for one year of general acute care hospital experienceppbrppIn return for your efforts CCHCS offers a comprehensive benefits package includingpulliBonus for those new to State ServiceliliGenerous paid time off and holiday scheduleliliState of California retirement that vests in 5 years visit wwwCalPERScagov for retirement formulasliliRobust 401k and 457 savings plans tax defer up to 39000  52000 per yearliliA variety of medical dental and vision insurance optionsliliAnd much moreliulpbrppWe currently have opportunities at Chuckawalla Valley State Prison CVSP located in BlytheppbrppTake the first step toward joining this team and apply onlineppbrppEOEp
